article.title: TCOM to Provide Aerostats
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: TCOM L.P., Columbia, Maryland, is being awarded a $12,204,993 firm-fixed-price order for the procurement of three 28M aerostat systems and three site spares in support of Persistent Ground Surveillance Systems for the Army.Â The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Lakehurst, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
